attributes.action: Lobby the United Nations to Investigate the reported Human rights violations, and crimes against humanity being perpetrated by Robert Mugabe and his regime in Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last 7 years there have been an increasing number of reports of human rights violations, torture, stavation and total economic collapse in Zimbabwe. If this situation is accurate and continues, then one can quite rightly make the assumption that there will be yet another civil rights blood bath in Africa. The U.N is the body with the remit to investigate such situations, and as Zimbabwe is a member state of the UN, they are best placed to determine the accuracy of these reports, and take appropriate action.
